name: Catch the Rain (Ainezumi)
description:
Catch the falling raindrops from the leaky roof above!

• Catch the Rain's Link =  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/670319955/

- - - Scoring System - - - 

★ 1 Raindrop (blue) = +5 points

★ 1 Acid Raindrop (pink) = +25 points

★ 1 Centipede = -10 points

★ 1 Brick = -50 points & -1 life

- - - How to Play - - -

➤ Press down (with your finger/"left-mouse" button) on the in-game "left arrow" button to make the container move left. 

➤ Press down (with your finger/"left-mouse" button) on the in-game "right arrow" button to make the container move right. 

Credits: Drawings/Graphics, Music, SFX, and Coding by Ainezumi

This game is mobile friendly.

There were quite a few spring showers this month. While I was kept inside by the pouring rain, the sound of falling rain ended up inspiring me!
